address.aria-label: Phone number for Riverside School District
Fax number for Riverside School District

span.data-emptytext: Riverside School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Non Discrimination Statement: The Riverside School District No. 416 does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal, and provides equal access to the Boys Scouts of America and all other designated youth groups listed in Title 36 of the United States Code as a patriotic society. District programs will be free from sexual harassment. The following employees have been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Title IX Officer: John McCoy, Director of Student & Staff Services, (509) 464-8204, Section 504/ADA Coordinator: Samantha Griggs, Special Services Director, (509) 464-8201, or Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator, John McCoy, Director of Student & Staff Services (509) 464-8204, at 34515 N. Newport Hwy., Chattaroy, WA 99003. PER RCW 9.41.270 RIVERSIDE SCHOOL DISTRICT IS A "GUN-FREE ZONE."

p.span: Non Discrimination Statement: The Riverside School District No. 416 does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal, and provides equal access to the Boys Scouts of America and all other designated youth groups listed in Title 36 of the United States Code as a patriotic society. District programs will be free from sexual harassment. The following employees have been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Title IX Officer: John McCoy, Director of Student & Staff Services, (509) 464-8204, Section 504/ADA Coordinator: Samantha Griggs, Special Services Director, (509) 464-8201, or Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator, John McCoy, Director of Student & Staff Services (509) 464-8204, at 34515 N. Newport Hwy., Chattaroy, WA 99003. PER RCW 9.41.270 RIVERSIDE SCHOOL DISTRICT IS A "GUN-FREE ZONE."

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
